RAD_DATASOURCES.DEFAULT_WHERE: NETTING_REF_NO <> (SELECT NETTING_REF_NO FROM LBTBS_CASHFLOW_NETTING_MASTER) AND TRANCHE_REF_NO = (SELECT TRANCHE_REF_NO FROM LBTBS_CASHFLOW_NETTING_MASTER) AND VALUE_DATE <= (SELECT VALUE_DATE FROM LBTBS_CASHFLOW_NETTING_MASTER) AND CFLOW_NETTING_STATUS = 'N'

RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT A.CONTRACT_REF_NO, A.USER_REF_NO FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT A WHERE A.CONTRACT_REF_NO IN (SELECT B.BORROWER_TRANCHE_REF_NO FROM LPTB_CONTRACT_MASTER B, LBTBS_CASHFLOW_NETTING_MASTER C WHERE B.contract_ref_no = C.tranche_ref_no) OR A.CONTRACT_REF_NO IN (SELECT D.TRANCHE_REF_NO FROM LBTBS_CASHFLOW_NETTING_MASTER D WHERE D.TRANCHE_REF_NO = A.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND A.MODULE_CODE = 'LS') AND A.AUTH_STATUS ='A' AND A.CONTRACT_STATUS <>'V' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM olvw_avl_prod_br_usr WHERE product_code = a.product_code AND branch_code = global.current_branch AND user_id= global.user_id)
